name: Fantastic Adventure (GALIS)
description:
Welcome to Fantastic Adventure.

Save the world. Defeat the evil horde.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-How To Play -

Level 1

Your energy is going down. Get gems to replenish energy.

W/A/S/D or arrow keys to move

(END) to jump

(DELETE) to shoot/run

Hold down (DELETE) to run/jump higher

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Level 2

W/A/S/D or arrow keys to move.

Mouse to turn.

Left click to shoot.

Right click to switch guns

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

LEVEL 3

Boss Fight!

Test Your Skills

*Not for the faint of heart. Please Enjoy.
